entry.title: Install Octopress
entry.content:
安装Octopress步骤

git clone git://github.com/imathis/octopress.git octopress
cd octopress

Next, install dependencies.

gem install bundler
rbenv rehash # If you use rbenv, rehash to be able to run the bundle command
bundle install

Install the default Octopress theme.

rake install

git clone https://github.com/kAworu/octostrap3.git .themes/octostrap3
rake “install[octostrap3]”

rake setup_github_pages

git@github.com:username/username.github.io.git git remote add origin https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git

发布post

rake new_page[super-awesome]

rake generate
sudo rake deploy
